Kawakubo’s first iteration of his Converse Chuck Taylors came about in 2009 when she modified the original by stripping back its contrast stitching. The ASICS logo can be found on one side of the heel in green, while "GEL" appears on the back of the heel also in green. The circular Hidden logo also appears on the midsole and the tongue in green.
